timeline.message: DHFPROD-6307: Add new card is not visible in curate tile for user with read only role

timeline.bodyText: Can we also disable the cursor on the disabled plus icon so it is consistent? Not sure if that was already discussed with UX. I see the cursor is also still enabled there for the Load tile as well, but I think it would make sense to have it disabled all-around.
timeline.author: briantang

replies.bodyText: Good finding... I had discussion with UX team and we will be keeping banned pointer consistently. I have updated accordingly
replies.author: AkshayBajajML
